issue.title: examples/windowsize: Crash when trying to toggle the fullscreen mode from the 'native' fullscreen mode macOS

repository.name: ebiten
repository.description: A dead simple 2D game engine for Go

issue.body:
This happens in a complicated situation.

* Press R to make the window resizable
* Click a maximizing button to make a 'fullscreen' mode (This is different from Ebiten's fullscreen mode)
* Press F to make the window fullscreen

```

)
```

rename.from: Crash on glfwSetWindowAttrib for a fullscreen transparent window on macOS
rename.to: Crash on glfwSetWindowAttrib for a native fullscreen window on macOS

body: I cannot reproduce this on macOS 10.15 and unfortunately I don't have a Mac new enough to run macOS 11.

rename.from: Crash on glfwSetWindowAttrib for a native fullscreen window on macOS
rename.to: Crash on glfwSetWindowAttrib for a native fullscreen window

body: This should finally be fixed now with 0d599026d04ddcc2695ae938fc1864523dab7a34. Thank you for the bug report!
